title: The Branded Female Fencer - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Adventure   Fantasy   Romance   Shoujo   Tragedy
tags: Abandoned Children   Adapted to Manga   Adventurers   Appearance Different from Actual Age   Beastkin   Character Growth   Curses   Demons   Depictions of Cruelty   Elves   Fantasy World   Female Protagonist   Immortals   Mercenaries   Monsters   Mysterious Past   Overpowered Protagonist   R-15   Religions   Spirit Users   Spirits   Strong to Stronger   Sword And Magic   Sword Wielder   Wars
author: Hermit   はーみっと
description: She was driven out from her birthplace and her home. Even her reason to exist was denied. However, there still was someone who willingly offered her a helping hand. Years had passed and then she was alone again. She who had grown beautiful and strong, departed on a journey to explore the world which once rejected her. And one and a half year had passed since then…>
